revisionDesc.change: extracted transcription from Major Authors cd

opener.dateline: 431 Stevens st. / cor West. / Camden, / N. Jersey, Dec.December 5.

body.p: Hasn't this got vim enough—from your point of view, even as editor of the paper—to make you print it in the Tribune?
I am still tediously invalided here—but have not at all given up the hope of getting out of the woods, & doing some work yet.
When you come to Philadelphia, try to come over & see me.
